meetings.title: PAY-108 Incident Review
meetings.notes:
## Incident Review: PAY-108 - Duplicate Charges

### Timeline
- 12 hours ago: First duplicate charge detected
- 11 hours ago: Bob started investigation
- 7 hours ago: Root cause identified - race condition
- 6 hours ago: PR-148 created with fix
- 4 hours ago: PR-148 approved by Alice

### Root Cause
Race condition in payment processor when handling high-traffic scenarios.
Two concurrent requests for same order ID can both pass validation.

### Impact
- 3 customers affected
- $1,247 in duplicate charges (refunded)
- No data integrity issues

### Fix
PR-148 implements distributed lock using Redis to prevent concurrent processing.

### Action Items
- Deploy PR-148 to production (Eva - today)
- Add monitoring for duplicate transaction patterns (Eva - next sprint)
- Load testing for race conditions (PAY-105 - this sprint)

### Notes
This incident pulled Bob away from PR reviews for 12+ hours.
PR-145 (retry logic) has been waiting 52 hours as a result.

action_items.description: Deploy PR-148 with distributed lock fix
